Package logicalComponents

Interface Summary
HandChangeListener This is the interface all classes must implement if they wish to receive event notifications from the Hand class.
 

Class Summary
Controller This is the bondary class which interfaces with the GUI and acts as a bridge to all of the data of the logical Hand.
Hand This class contains a collection of Joints which combined form a representation of the human hand.
HandEvent The class which holds information about the changes in state of the Hand class.
HandGestures This class contains an assortment of hand gestures that are used primarily by the Controller class to make the robotic hand gesture in a certain way.
HandRecorder  
HandRecordPlayer This class contains a collection of recordings which can be identified with a title.
Joint Logically represents a single hinged joint with a fixed range of motion.
Port Port class This class handles opening and closing the port, as well as reading and sending data.
 

Enum Summary
JointName An enum class which contains the information of the maximum and minimum locations of each servo in respect to the joint which it represents.
